the journey

  1. Home
  2. The Journey

C.B Digital - constantly striving to be one step ahead in technology.

  • 1985 - 1990

    With our long history in the industry that began in mobile and satellite communications in 1985 and has evolved over the past years into providing technologies such as intelligent lighting, automation and entertainment systems.

    Our expertise in the smart home and custom install market has found us providing systems not only in the U.K but to clients around the world including France, Italy, Spain, Russia & Middle East to name a few

  • 1990 - 1995

    We were one of a leading companies to provide satellite for both TVRO (Television Receive Only) and Data Services. In 1985 we cherish the idea of making a new concept that was not acceptable apart from early adopters. As a company that prides ourselves on good service we knew that our company would go from strength to strength.

    Our products included SMATV (Satellite Master Antenna Television) for hotels, fixed dishes for single channel, motorised dishes for multi-site applications.

    In 1990 our mobile network sections of the company included car installations and voice recognition. We needed to be a leading edge company, so in 1995 we took the plunge in plasma TVs and were impressed with their flatness and reduce weight. This was a major breaking point in technology and our customers were fully impressed. The plasma screen provided something that the market had never seen, and was different from what has come before.

  • 1995 - 2000

    As our reputation grew we had to show our worth and in 1998 we provided audio-visual, TVRO and automation for the home and office. CB Digital knew that this was a big step forward and knew the future was bright. We then took on yachts that were over 100' feet long. This was uncommon to see a boat of this magnitude in those days. We were contracted to take on the AV, that included surround sound, plasma TVs with TVRO and data satellite.

  • 2000 - 2005

    In 2000 something had caught our imagination, it was the Internet! The World Wide Web provided endless possibilities and had many benefits to our lives and would be the forefront of what we do, say and work.

    As this grew we have ventured in to cloud Technology to serve many parts of the business, that include web hosting, email and critical backup.

  • 2005 - 2015

    It was realised that clients demanded a more bespoke service that integrated audio, visual and communications into their homes, and from this need we lead the way to providing a discrete, simple to use solution that gives outstanding service.

    From this long term experience we can guide you through the process of planning and choosing the right system, and minimise any headaches associated with the technical aspect of a job.

    Whilst dealing in both domestic and commercial markets we can provide a high level of service and work closely with architects, consulting engineers, designers and builders from concept to completion stage.

    What makes us different? We are fully committed on all levels of technology. We endeavour to commit to our strengths and know that our clients are our number one priority.

our services

  1. Home
  2. Services

We've been building smart homes for over 20 years

CB Digital specialise in Home Cinema installations, Multi-room Audio, Lighting and Heating Control Systems and much more. We also plan, design and install high quality Integrated Homes.

We promise not to 'blind you with science' and will make sure everything is explained in a clear and understandable way.

Contact Us

Communications

We know that your communications service need to be reliable. Being able to communicate effectively is the most important of all life skills. Communication is simply the act of transferring information from one place to another, whether this be vocally (using voice), written (using printed or digital media such as books, magazines, websites or emails), visually (using logos, maps, charts or graphs) CB Digital strive to deliver these skills to the Individual home user or the Business users of 2015.

Contact Us

Networking & I.T

A computer network or data network is a telecommunications network which allows computers to exchange data. In computer networks, networked computing devices exchange data with each other along network links (data connections). The connections between nodes are established using either cable media or wireless media. C B Digital Supply and Install systems for all types of users.

Contact Us

Intelligent Lighting

Every room in your home has its own style, its own decor, and its own distinctive personality.Yet to bring out the individual beauty of each of those rooms, they need their own unique lighting.

Lighting that can dim to create a softer mood, or to liven things up. In fact, the type of lighting you create in a room can virtually redecorate it, giving you and your guests a whole new way to see your home.

Contact Us

Control Systems

A good control system is vital to ensure every piece of equipment communicates and functions as it should, and doesn’t cause confusion to the user. This is why we install intuitive touch displays with simple tactile buttons.

The control system only interprets how it is programmed and is why we make sure our programmer are proficiently trained to cope with the demands of our clients. By combining all the equipment with pre-programming sequences it can dim the lights, close the curtains, drop down the screen and select a movie from the touch of one button. By doing this it ensures the ultimate user experience.

Contact Us

Automation

Our work is creative, cutting-edge, innovative and highly effective. That’s its streamlined structure provides us with the flexibility to deliver excellent work in minimal time, and to tailor campaigns on an on-going basis according real-time analytics. We continuously measure the results of our initiatives to ensure that they deliver against our clients’ brand and business objectives. We create meaningful communication that transcends the digital divide, and engages audiences in all spheres of society.

Nest Thermostat, (Illustrated) enables user to control room or rooms over the net worldwide

Contact Us

Home Cinema

Just imagine your own dedicated Home cinema providing you with a realistic theatre going experience in the comfort of your own home. With a front or rear projection a very large screen size can be achieved. As the picture is only part of the overall effect, the correct speaker system, DVD player, Amps and lighting, also play a huge part in creating the right results.

We can help with the design and planning to create your own Cinema at home. Basic packages include stereo systems going through to high end state of the art technology complex 5.1 or 7.1 surround systems, we will ensure you maximise your budget and get the best out of the equipment. Our installation service includes full and comprehensive demonstration of the equipment giving you the confidence to use it once we have left.

Using state of the art technology here at CB Digital Ltd Home Installations we can help you create a home cinema for your home. Home cinema is a set of AV equipment connected and calibrated together to give you movie theatre quality sound in your home. Our experts can advise on the best system for your requirements and room size.

Contact Us

Programming & Coding

We at CB Digital have programming engineers for programming Crestron and RTI Controllers, Lutron Lighting, Rako Lighting systems and system programming. 2015 we will be adding coding and web design that require front-end developers and designers.

Contact Us

Aftercare

At CB Digital we can connect over the network to provide built proof reliably.

Installations worldwide.
